exploreExtraordinary:
Explore the extraordinary: where dreams
come to life!
enjoyMoments:
Don't hesitate! Indulge yourself in a timeless moment at the future's carnival and
immerse in a day of joy, discovery, and unforgettable experiences!
welcomeBelforaine:
Welcome to Belforaine,
the paradise of the future !
futureMagic: Discover a world where electrifying LANs, breathtaking virtual reality adventures, inspiring conferences, and endless entertainment merge. Dive into the magic that the future holds, all in one destination. Belforaine, where the future becomes reality, and pleasure is infinite!
ridesExperience:
More than just rides, an experience
that spins magic infinitely!

presentationCards.title: Join the Belforaine LAN Fest!
presentationCards.content: Unforgettable gaming tournaments await you at LAN Fest, the gamer's paradise in Belforaine. Challenge your friends, measure your skills and dive into the ultimate multiplayer action!

presentationCards.title: Discover our adventures!
presentationCards.content: Our attractions are constantly evolving. From thrilling roller coasters to surprising shows, dive into a universe in constant transformation.

presentationCards.title: Taste the Flavors of the Future
presentationCards.content: Our restaurants take you into the culinary future with innovative dishes, exotic flavors and unique dining experiences.

footer.newsletter: Sign up to the Newsletter of Belforaine
